mapper.select: select u.user_name, u.user_avatar, g.id, g.user_id, g.goods_title, g.goods_content, g.goods_photos, g.goods_old_price, g.goods_price, g.create_time from user u join goods g on u.id = g.user_id where u.is_delete = 0 and g.is_delete = 0 and (g.goods_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or g.goods_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) order by g.create_time desc

SELECT u.user_name, u.user_avatar, g.id, g.user_id, g.goods_title, g.goods_content, g.goods_photos, g.goods_old_price, g.goods_price, g.create_time FROM goods g JOIN user u ON g.user_id = u.id WHERE g.is_delete = 0 AND u.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY g.create_time DESC
